document.text:
From: Mark Steward <Mark.Steward@fca.org.ulc> 
To: (USANYS)" >, Kate Tuckley 
<Kate.Tuckley@fca.org.ulc> 
Cc: 
(USANYS)" 
,  Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.ulc>, Harry Caldecott 
<Harry.Caldecott®fca.org.uk>, Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>, Harry Caldecott 
<Harry.Caldecott®fca.org.uk>, Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>, Harry Caldecott 
<Harry.Caldecott®fca.org.uk> 
Subject: RE: Confidential & Urgent 
Date: The, 03 Dec 2019 18:05:55 +0000 
Inline-Images: image001.png; image002.png; image003.png 
We've only received the additional material today; it is voluminous which means we won't be in a  position 
for any meaningful conversation tomorrow. I  suspect not before Friday either. Can we pencil in 3-4 pm on 
Friday and will confirm on Thursday ? 
Cheers 
Mark Steward 
Executive Director 
Enforcement and Market Oversight 
A
FINANCIAL 
CONDUCT 
AUTHORITY 
12 Endeavour Square 
London 
E20 LIN 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7066 1600 
www.fca.org.uk
Follow us: 
Private Secretary: Harry Caldecott (harry.caldecott@ka.org.tS
Personal Assistant: Kelly Eldred A(kly.eldred@fca.org.uk) 
From: (USANYS) [mailto: 
Sent: 03 December 2019 17:18 
To: Mark Steward <Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk>; Kate Tuckley <Kate.Tuckley@fca.org.uk> 
Cc: Cowley, Jason (USANYS) <Jason.Cowley@usdoj.gov>; (USANYS); Kelly 
Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>; Harry Caldecott <Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.uk>; Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>; 
Harry Caldecott <Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.uk> 
Subject: RE: Confidential & Urgent 
Mark —  Hope you had a good weekend and just wanted to circle back on this. Realizing it is starting to get a bit late in the 
day in London, would tomorrow morning (New York time) work for a follow up call on this? Perhaps around 10am our 
time/3pm in London? If so, we can circulate another dial in. 
Thanks, 
EFTA00018119

From: Mark Steward <Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk> 
Sent: Thursday, November 28, 2019 12:59 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
<Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>; Harry Caldecott <Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.uk>; Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>; Harry 
Caldecott <Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.uk> 
Subject: RE: Confidential & Urgent 
(USANYS) ; Kate Tuckley <Kate.Tuckley@fca.org.uk> 
(USANYS) <>; Kelly Eldred 
Thanks for taking the call today and look forward to speaking again early next week. And happy 
Thanksgiving ! 
Kind regards 
Mark Steward 
Executive Director 
Enforcement and Market Oversight 
A
FINANCIAL 
CONDUCT 
AUTHORITY 
12 Endeavour Square 
London 
E20 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7066 1600 
www.fca.org.uk
Follow us: 
#C3 
Private Secretary: Harry Caldecott (harry.caldecott@ka.orpAc)
Personal Assistant: Kelly Eldred 
(kelly.eldred@fca.org.uk) 
From: 
(USANYS) 
[mailto: 
Sent: 28 November 2019 15:57 
To: 
Kate Tuckley 
<Kate.TuckleyPfca.org.uk>
Cc: Mark Steward <Mark.StewardPfca.org.uk>. Cowley, Jason (USANYS) clason.CowleyPusdoj.gov>.
(USANYS) c:,; Kelly Eldred <Kelly.EldredPfca.org.uk>. Harry Caldecott 
<H 
a 
rry.CaldecottPfca.org.uk>
Subject: Re: Confidential & Urgent 
To allow a few of my colleagues to join, can we instead use a dial in: 
Thanks, and talk soon.. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Nov 28, 2019, at 10:31 AM, Kate Tuckley <Kate.Tuckley(Wfca.org.uk> wrote: 
EFTA00018120

Great much appreciated thanks 
From: (USANYS) [mailto: 
Sent: 28 November 2019 15:30 
To: Kate Tuckley 
<Kate.Tuckley@fca.org.uk>
Cc: Mark Steward 
<Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk>•
(USANYS) Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>• Harry Caldecott 
<Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.uk>
Subject: Re: Confidential & Urgent 
Okay, please call my cell: 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Nov 28, 2019, at 10:25 AM, Kate Tuckley <Kate.Tuckley_@fca.org.uk> wrote: 
Hi 
I  have spoken to Mark's business support and he is available at 4.15pm (UK time) today (ie in just 
under an hour's time). It is quite urgent so if we could speak then it would be greatly appreciated. 
If that does work please let us know what number to call you on? 
Many thanks 
From: (USANYS) [mailto:
Sent: 28 November 2019 14:53 
To:  Mark Steward 
<Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk> 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Tuckley <Kate.Tuckley_@fca.org.uk>. Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>. Harry Caldecott 
<Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.uk>
Subject: Re: Confidential & Urgent 
; Kate 
Hi Mark - Thanks for reaching out. We do have an active investigation and would be happy to talk. As you likely know, 
today is a holiday in the US. Is this something we could discuss on Monday or is it more urgent than that? Thanks, 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Nov 28, 2019, at 9:28 AM, Mark Steward <Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk> wrote: 
Dear Can I  ask whether this is still an active matter ? if so, I  wonder if we could speak 
when it is convenient. 
Cheers 
Mark Steward 
Executive Director 
Enforcement and Market Oversight 
<image001.png> 
12 Endeavour Square 
London 
E20 lJN 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7066 1600 
www.fca.org.uk
EFTA00018121

Follow us: 
<imageoolosa 
<imageoos.ma
Private Secretary: Harry Catdecott (harry.caldecottafca.orgAS
Personal Assistant: Kelly Eldred lc,(1y.eldredfitfca.org.uki
From: 
Sent: 28 November 2019 14:25 
To: Mark Steward 
<Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk>. 
(USANYS) 
(USANYS) < 
Cc: Kate Tuckley <Kate.Tucklev@fca.org.uk>; Kelly Eldred <Kelly.Eldred@fca.org.uk>. Harry Caldecott 
<Harry.Caldecott@fca.org.uk>
Subject: Re: Confidential & Urgent 
Looping in They run our unit and oversee the Epstein case. 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Nov 28, 2019, at 8:30 AM, Mark Steward <Mark.Steward@fca.org.uk> wrote: 
Hi
—
Can you let me know, urgently, whether anyone in your office is handling the investigation into 
Jeffery Epstein, especially anything in relation to JP Morgan (he was a  client of their private wealth 
division) and, if so, who, as we need to have a  chat. If this is not in SDNY, do you know who is 
handling ongoing work into Mr E's world ? 
Cheers 
Mark Steward 
Executive Director 
Enforcement and Market Oversight 
<image001.png> 
12 Endeavour Square 
London 
E20 1J N 
Tel: +44 (0)20 7066 1600 
www.fca.org.uk
Follow us: 
<irnage002.onga 
<irnagc003.onga
